name: Cool Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
FUN, ACQUISION OF SKILLS and LEARNING.
How?
We are combining:
- simple board that is innovative, illustrative of fun and fundamental concepts, conducive to acquiring working skills of basic geometry and trigonometry;
- innovative five outcome dice;
- rules that allow for both probability and strategy;
- kicking tokens off board, which increases outcomes and allows for complex interactions and three player game;
- moving on the board, which allows for strategy
- decision making (every player must decide between moving and rolling at every turn)
The fact that creativity and imagination allow for three players to share a game known for many years as allowing two players play only is paramount.
Mom, Dad and baby can spend quality time together, playing a simple, nonviolent game that will help the young one acquire valuable skills and working knowledge of basic concepts.
